programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> -nm128 </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
opcode FirstEl, k, k[] ;returns the first element of vector kArr kArr[] xin xout kArr[0] endop
instr 1 kArr[] fillarray 6, 3, 9, 5, 1 kFirst FirstEl kArr printf "kFirst = %d\n", 1, kFirst turnoff endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> i 1 0 .1 </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
